questions.question: If v is the velocity and L is the angular momentum of a body in uniform circular motion, then

answers.a: v varies but L is constant
answers.b: L varies but v is constant
answers.c: magnitude of v and L is constant
answers.d: Both L and v are varies

questions.question: The impulse momentum principle is applicable

answers.a: if there is no external force acting on the body
